Your Source for Trailer Suspension Solutions.

Trailer manufacturers and fleet owners who demand proven performance and long-term value from their investment choose to put their trust in us. We are Hutchens. Generations of support.

Slider Systems

Spring Suspensions

Series 10

A lighter-weight, extremely durable subframe and suspension system.

Series 10

The Series 10 family of sliders is now available for both van and chassis applications, with as many configurations and options as you may require. The Series 10 Slider has the corrosion-resistant, high-strength steel construction you demand, with the versatility to offer a variety of mounting heights, frame depths, spring centers, special attachments, and finish coatings – each unique to your specifications. Every Series 10 slider system is backed by a Hutch 10 Year Warranty.

More Information

9700 Series

The most versatile and reliable trailer suspension available, anywhere.

9700 Series

The Hutch 9700 Series leads our long and distinguished line of trailer suspension systems. 9700 Suspensions incorporate innovative thinking to create a durable and reliable system that not only extends service life, reduces downtime and protects your cargo – but also provides a smooth and comfortable ride. The 9700 can be assembled in single, tandem or multi-axle configurations.

More Information

Genuine Hutch

The Genuine Hutch Mark means our parts are engineered to do their job.

Genuine Hutch Parts

The upfront price of a will-fit or knock-off part may seem less, but its “true cost” escalates farther down the road… in defects, downtime and delays. Genuine Hutch parts are designed to exact OEM specifications and tolerances to ensure the performance, safety and durability of every trailer using our suspension systems. So look for the Hutch Mark.

More Information
